changeSet.author: jordanchavez@kpmg.com
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE MODEL_SCORE DROP COLUMN LENDER_SCORE_PCTILE ALTER TABLE MODEL_SCORE DROP COLUMN SCORE_PCTILE ALTER TABLE MODEL_SCORE DROP COLUMN SCORE_RANK ALTER TABLE MODEL_SCORE DROP COLUMN UWRTR_SCORE_PCTILE UPDATE SCORING_MODEL_TYPE_REF SET CODE = 'EARLY_PAYMENT_DEFAULT_SELECTION', DESCRIPTION = 'Early Payment Defalt Selection' WHERE CODE = 'EARLY_PENDING_DEFAULT_SELECTION' GO EXEC SP_RENAME 'SCORING_MODEL_FACTOR', 'SCORING_MODEL_VERSION_FACTOR' GO ALTER TABLE SCORING_MODEL_VERSION_FACTOR DROP CONSTRAINT SCORING_MODEL_FACTOR_FK_QA_MODEL_ID ALTER TABLE SCORING_MODEL_VERSION_FACTOR DROP COLUMN SCORING_MODEL_ID GO ALTER TABLE SCORING_FACTOR ADD SCORING_MODEL_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NULL ALTER TABLE SCORING_FACTOR ADD CONSTRAINT SCORING_FACTOR_FK_SCORING_MODEL_ID FOREIGN KEY(SCORING_MODEL_ID) REFERENCES SCORING_MODEL(SCORING_MODEL_ID) GO UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'DEFECT_PROBABILITY_FWD') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Defect Probability (Fwd) Percentile' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'DEFECT_PROBABILITY_REV') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Defect Probability (Rev) Percentile' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'DEFECT_PROBABILITY_REV') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Defect Probability (Rev) Score' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'LENDER_MONITORING_FWD_SERVICING') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Lender Monitoring Forward Servicing Score Multiplier' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'LENDER_MONITORING_FWD_SERVICING') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Lender Monitoring Forward Servicing Score Percentile' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'LENDER_MONITORING_FWD_UNDERWRITING') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Lender Monitoring Forward Underwriting Score Multiplier' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'LENDER_MONITORING_FWD_UNDERWRITING') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Lender Monitoring Forward Underwriting Score Percentile' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'LENDER_MONITORING_REV_SERVICING') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Lender Monitoring HECM Servicing Score Multiplier' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'LENDER_MONITORING_REV_SERVICING') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Lender Monitoring HECM Servicing Score Percentile' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'LENDER_MONITORING_REV_UNDERWRITING') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Lender Monitoring HECM Underwriting Score Multiplier' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'LENDER_MONITORING_REV_UNDERWRITING') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Lender Monitoring HECM Underwriting Score Percentile' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'DEFECT_PROBABILITY_FWD') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Lender Forward Risk Above Threshold' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'DEFECT_PROBABILITY_REV') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Lender HECM Risk Above Threshold' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'DEFECT_PROBABILITY_FWD') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Underwriter Forward Score Above Threshold' UPDATE SCORING_FACTOR SET SCORING_MODEL_ID = (SELECT SCORING_MODEL_ID FROM SCORING_MODEL WHERE CODE = 'DEFECT_PROBABILITY_REV') WHERE FACTOR_ATTRIBUTE_NAME = 'Underwriter HECM Score Above Threshold'
